last_episode_to_air.name: Back in the USA
last_episode_to_air.overview: Charles Manson's pen pal gets confrontational in an interview. Also, David prepares for the end of the world and visits an extreme haunted house.

name: Dark Tourist
overview: The definition of "tourism" is redefined as New Zealand filmmaker David Farrier sets his sights on the world of dark tourism.  From nuclear tourism in Japan to Pablo Escobar-inspired tourism in Columbia to frontier tourism in Turkmenistan, David visits the worldâ€™s grisly and offbeat destinations, meeting travelers drawn to them, and the people telling these stories day after day.

episodes.name: Latin America
episodes.overview: David meets Pablo Ecobar's enforcer in Colombia. Later, he witnesses an exorcism in Mexico and participates in a faux illegal border crossing.

episodes.name: Japan
episodes.overview: David visits a town hit by heavy radiation, hikes through a supposedly haunted forest and explores an abandoned island with its former residents.

episodes.name: United States
episodes.overview: David meets a Jeffrey Dahmer enthusiast in Milwaukee, takes two tours dedicated to JFK's assassination in Dallas and dines with vampires in New Orleans.

episodes.name: The Stans
episodes.overview: In Kazakhstan, David and a fellow dark tourist swim in a lake formed by a nuclear blast. Later, David's trip to Turkmenistan doesn't go as planned

episodes.name: Europe
episodes.overview: After participating in a World War II reenactment, David visits a disturbing museum. He then travels to Cyprus in hopes of seeing a forbidden city.

episodes.name: South East Asia
episodes.overview: In Cambodia, David is offered the chance to shoot a cow. Later, he tours Myanmar before witnessing the cleaning of a mummified corpse in Indonesia.

episodes.name: Africa
episodes.overview: David attends a voodoo festival in Benin, visits an infamous area of Johannesburg and speaks with white South African separatists.

episodes.name: Back in the USA
episodes.overview: Charles Manson's pen pal gets confrontational in an interview. Also, David prepares for the end of the world and visits an extreme haunted house.
